Detailed Description

It contains the properties of a resource manager has been specified inside the actual transactional profile; this is a reacher struct than rsrmgr_config_s

Definition at line 149 of file client_config.h.

Field Documentation

int act_rsrmgr_config_s::dynamically_defined

TRUE if the configuration has been dynamically defined by the Application Program using XTA interface; FALSE if the configuration has been statically defined inside the lixac.conf file

GModule* act_rsrmgr_config_s::module
